question: My son Jacob was recently diagnosed with ADD and EDS.  I had gestational diabetes while pregnant with Jacob and he was born at 32 weeks.  When Jacob was born he seemed perfectly normal.  He required nothing at birth and we came home in 4 days after an emergency C-section.  I need some help understanding his diagnosis and some advice on how to manage it.  He has been given medications, of which I am not very comfortable, and have had to take him out of daycare because it seems to make him worse.  I would greatly appreciate any advice that may help us manage and understand.  Thank you!
title: Child with ADD and EDS
